title: Stuart Andrew – 2022 Comments on Full Sutton Prison
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Stuart Andrew, the Prisons Minister, on 3 August 2022.
content: I am delighted work can begin on yet another modern, innovative prison that will skill-up untold numbers of offenders to live a crime-free life while making our streets safer.
The new prison at Full Sutton will also support hundreds of jobs, in construction and afterwards, representing a major boost to Yorkshire’s economy.
